title: VR-Based Marine Escape Game for Sustainable Marine Development Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of marine ecosystem basics, environmental awareness, and VR device experience
context.additional_context: Team-based collaboration and problem-solving projects utilizing personal smart devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain sustainable marine resource management methods with over 85% accuracy in VR simulations.
Teams can design five or more marine pollution solutions and complete a PBL report.
Over 90% of learners reflect at least three marine ecosystem protection guidelines into action plans in a VR escape game.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
